TestBurstgun.name: Test Burstgun
TestBurstgun.description: A two-handed item equipable as a Burstgun.

Burstgun.name: Burstgun
Burstgun.description: A standard-issue two-handed Burstgun given to all new Slinger Beta Union members. Burstguns are short ranged shotguns that can deal a lot of damage from their energy blasts.
